title: Legit Riot, 6 seasons i've been playing and you have yet to fix it.. Riot you tools fix it already..
body:
So get to gold.. yay.... then proceed to have 10 games... 8 of the 10.. have AFKers on my team.

Lose games, due to AFKers, report.. nothing happens to the person who afked.

And I lose LP.. and the only response i get is.. Oh you belong in that elo.

Or gg noob get rekt, or HAHAHAHAHAHAHAH EZ GAME.

Yer cool man, i belong in an elo where someone will AFK/DC for half the game or the whole game, and oh no they get a little message saying stop being afk.. yer man thats super fair for the other 4 players.

I have to keep playing, and losing LP because of afkers.. this is a joke.. it's been a problem for years, and you riot tools refuse to fix it.

JUST FIX IT, if someone AFKS... why should the whole team lose FULL LP??.

If your response is, thats apart of the risk you take when you play online.. No thats BS... this isn't season 1, they should have something in place to see that were trying to win a losing game, and not go oh sorry 4v5 STILL LOSE FULL LP regardless.. thats a joke..

You get 8/10 games in a row with an AFKer and not get mad, you let me know when that happens.


You have a system in place to ban people, you have a system in place for everything but not this..

Just legit fix this shit.. it's been years... FIX IT....

replies.body:
If you have been playing for 6 years you would've realized by now Riot's algorithm:

No profit = Not happening

System is working as intended. You have the picture of progression dangled in front of you (Gold/Plat/Diamond). If they made it easier to get to the division you wanted, you would stop playing and stop spending money on the game. Realistically it's more or less another version of gambling
